message.content: {"id": "15899", "title": "Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time", "description": "", "OB": "When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, there is an issue with the 'Close All Saved' functionality. To reproduce the problem, follow these steps: Close all editors, create a new file named f1.txt, and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. However, when performing these steps, nothing happens.", "EB": "", "SR": "To resolve this bug, the issue with the 'Close All Saved' functionality needs to be addressed. Specifically, when using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, closing all editors and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu should successfully close all saved files."}
